p: With the Hemotek feeding system, the recovery rates of BTV-4 ITA (70.5%; 95%CI = 65.6–75%) and BTV-2 (66.5%, 95%CI = 60.6–72%), obtained at 10 dpi from Sardinian midges were similar ( p > 0.05). Both rates, however, were higher ( p < 0.05) than that of BTV-4 MOR (49.2%, 95%CI = 40.4–58%). The recovery rate of BTV-4 ITA was also higher ( p < 0.05) than that of BTV-8 (52.3%, 95%CI = 42.9–61.6%) ( Table 5). If the more conservative approach was used, the recovery rates of BTV-4 ITA, BTV-2, and BTV-8 were similar ( p > 0.05) but significantly higher ( p < 0.05) than those of BTV-4 MOR ( Table 5 and Table 6).
